title: luke.eastop.ceramics
description:
Crucible Dish / Slate 
I've been really enjoying making these dark blue/grey pieces. It's a generous colour, I think most things would look good made in it, but this one has been blessed with a nice shape and weight too.

Available on my shop - link in bio

Thanks!
